name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Charge for Outlook: Send mass emails

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the full potential of Microsoft Outlook with Charge, a groundbreaking extension designed for bulk email outreach.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sending bulk emails in Outlook manually or via Mail Merge is boring, complex, and time-consuming. 

It took you HOURS to understand how to use Mail Merge and send hundreds of emails. 

❗️CHARGE SOLVES THESE PROBLEMS, AND HERE'S HOW:

✅ Add the recipient’s contacts in 5 seconds - click 1 button and select your CSV file with emails. Charge will also care for you and highlight emails with typo errors so your mailing list is clear.

✅ Personalize your email templates with variables to drive engagement and avoid spam folder. Your imagination is the limit.

✅ Send 200+ emails automatically just by hitting the “send” button - then wait and switch to other tasks.

✅ Connect with your CRM system effortlessly using our seamless BCC integration feature.

✅ Customize the timing of your email campaigns with adjustable delay settings, optimizing deliverability and open rates.

We've put all the functionality you need into a set of a few buttons, so Charge is simple to set up to do all this “magic, adding more automation to your workflow.

No matter which approach you use now - manual sending or Mail Merge, Charge will still do the job better.
